Project 2: ALIEN INVASION ðŸ‘½

My second project was bigger and more difficult! After being well versed in object-oriented programming I took it to the next level and made a simple alien invaders game.

I used the module pygame and several of its elements to make the game and the most time-consuming part of the project was realising how to make the ship and the aliens move.

Hi there! I'm Maisha - an aspiring data scientists & Software Engineer, currently studying Math at the University of Waterloo! Amongst other things, I also enjoy design & illustrating :) Currently - I'm really interested in machine learning and it's uses in the medical industry and would love to experience that given the oppurtunity. If I'm not coding then you'll usually see me drawing in my tablet!
